properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where ((ProcessCommandLine contains " /FO CSV" or ProcessCommandLine contains " -FO CSV") and (FolderPath endswith "\\whoami.exe" or ProcessVersionInfoOriginalFileName =~ "whoami.exe")) or ProcessCommandLine =~ "*whoami*>*"

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects the execution of "whoami.exe" with the "/FO" flag to choose CSV as output format or with redirection options to export the results to a file for later u
